content.text: I like suspense novels! What are your favorite authors?
I am currently reading Stephen King's "The Stand". I have also been reading Agatha Christie and Dean Koontz.
Those are all great authors! I have read a lot of Stephen King's work.
I love his work. I have also been reading books to help me with my addiction recovery.
I see. I have never had an addiction, so I do not know a lot about it.
Addiction is a very difficult thing to deal with. I have been in recovery for 10 years.
I am glad that you are in recovery. It is great that you are taking steps to get better.
Thank you. I am trying to make a better life for myself.
I think you are doing a great job.
Thank you. It means a lot to me.
You are welcome. I am always here to talk if you need someone to listen.
